line_1: With terrors new his infant mind appall,
line_2: And present fears his pristine joys recall;

line_1: Let Nature's voice thy ruthless heart appal!
line_2: The mother strikes — the guiltless babes shall fall!

line_1: Nor Pain nor Death the virtuous man appall;
line_2: No more then, Henry, I lament thy fall,
Two hours he talk'd, and said nothing at all:
